ACB is Bridging oceans, bringing water with

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”c16985e1-e0d6-4022-964d-e2bfc04fa633″ header_font=”Cinzel||||||||” header_font_size=”90px” background_layout=”dark” header_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_font_size_phone=”24px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Water For All

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Feature” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#2ec3e6″ background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_direction=”176deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”27%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”85%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/charter-boat-1a.jpg” custom_padding=”3vw||3vw||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||60px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||60px||false|false” background_last_edited=”on|tablet” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” background_color_gradient_stops_tablet=”#ffffff 10%|rgba(255,255,255,0.7) 100%” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”b327cbe4-b1d5-4b66-ad37-40c8f2f061ba” text_font=”Cinzel||||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”80px” text_line_height=”0.9em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font=”Cinzel||||||||” header_2_font_size=”52px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”32px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

impacting the world one shipment at a time

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”4827deed-2a92-4d97-a22f-f01067ae6873″ text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_font_size=”23px” text_line_height=”1.3em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Poppins|500|||||||” header_4_text_color=”gcid-e010f2a6-5bcc-4cbf-902a-b2f60822625a” header_4_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”center” min_height=”52.2px” custom_margin=”|||340px||” custom_padding=”16px|||||” header_4_font_size_tablet=”16px” header_4_font_size_phone=”14px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-e010f2a6-5bcc-4cbf-902a-b2f60822625a%22:%91%22header_4_text_color%22%93}”]

A Customs Brokerage has pledged to donate a percentage of each shipment to bring clean water to communities with BLUE.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|-114px||259px||” custom_padding=”|0px||||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/DSC_0744-copy-scaled.jpg” title_text=”DSC_0744 copy” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” width=”99.1%” min_height=”271.2px” custom_margin=”|||-103px||” custom_padding=”25px|||0px||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/DSC08881-copy-rotated.jpg” title_text=”DSC08881 copy” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” positioning=”absolute” position_origin_a=”top_right” width=”61.1%” custom_margin=”|-78px|21px|50px||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”1f09816e-184e-4ce5-a4cf-b39c52c423ca” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.75em” custom_margin=”|-115px||||” custom_padding=”|0px||123px||” text_font_size_tablet=”15px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”55px” header_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Today 1 in 10 people lack access to safe drinking water, but each year, more people globally face water scarcity due to pollution, deforestation, population growth, misuse, and changing climate patterns. 

A Customs Brokerage has a deep history with BLUE, with some of our founding members attending mission trips throughout the years. Now, with Water For All, we can use our business to positively impact these communities at a larger scale, unlocking them from cycles of poverty, sickness, and low education levels that lack of clean water inflicts.

It is part of BLUE’s message that anyone can make an impact and that everyone deserves the opportunity to make their own, and we want to continue to extend that.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Services” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”0px|||||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/BLUE-Logo-1-1.png” title_text=”BLUE Logo (1) (1)” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”||-20px|||” custom_padding=”|472px||472px||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”b327cbe4-b1d5-4b66-ad37-40c8f2f061ba” text_font=”Cinzel||||||||” text_font_size=”80px” text_line_height=”1.1em” header_font_size=”36px” header_2_font=”Cinzel||||||||” header_2_text_color=”gcid-e010f2a6-5bcc-4cbf-902a-b2f60822625a” header_2_font_size=”52px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”32px|||||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”32px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-e010f2a6-5bcc-4cbf-902a-b2f60822625a%22:%91%22header_2_text_color%22%93}”]

the effect

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Water-For-All-07-scaled.jpg” title_text=”Water For All-07″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Water-For-All-10-scaled.jpg” title_text=”Water For All-10″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Water-For-All-11-scaled.jpg” title_text=”Water For All-11″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_font_size=”26px” text_line_height=”1.2em” custom_padding=”||3px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BLUE advocates for a world where there is water for all, forever. Through service projects and sustainability education, BLUE connects families in Latin America to clean, fresh water and inspires young people to lead the way to a water-secure future.

That is a mission that aligns with us at A Customs Brokerage as people who live To Serve. We want to contribute to their mission in any way we can! BLUE has helped many communities so far and we not only want to help, but we want to call on others to join in to keep deepening the impact.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Call to Action” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/no-1520-x-680-px-4.png” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”26.6%||26.6%||true|false” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px|||||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”f97ee806-1c20-4a85-8e16-dc7a95752cfb” text_font=”Cinzel||||||||” text_font_size=”100px” header_2_font=”Cinzel||||||||” header_2_font_size=”120px” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_text_shadow_style=”preset1″ text_text_shadow_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

join the cause

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”115px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” text_font_size=”39px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_text_shadow_style=”preset1″ text_text_shadow_horizontal_length=”-0.12em” text_text_shadow_vertical_length=”0.08em” text_text_shadow_blur_strength=”0.13em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As one entity, our contribution will help many, but if we continue to band together, we can change the face of the planet. Everyone deserves access to clean water, join us in helping BLUE achieve that mission.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.bluemissions.org/brand-partnerships” button_text=”start your impact here” _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”f489fdc3-bf1e-40c7-852b-c42851d4acb9″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”50px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#f36621″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_font=”Cinzel|500|||||||” custom_margin=”-57px|||||” custom_padding=”12px|30px|12px|30px|true|true” button_text_size_tablet=”18px” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|phone” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”-6px” box_shadow_vertical=”8px” box_shadow_blur=”6px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|auto|113px|auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.7″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
